data.persona: I rob others when they are by themselves. People are scared of me. I like to be intimidating and I enjoy making others miserable.
data.description:
You are in the Supply store.
With so many ships docked at the port, sailor from all the ships crowd the bazaar. The supply store is filled with buyers today. The inside is plain and unadorned. Sturdy shelves hold common supplies. Along the walls are the larger items for sale.
There's a harp and a bouzoukis here.
A captain is here.

You are carrying some gold, wearing a hat, a jacket, and an eyepatch, and wielding a sword, a cannon, and a grappling hook.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal guitars and bouzoukis from the store
data.mid_motivation: I have to sell the bouzoukis and guitars for gold
data.long_motivation: I'm selling guitars and bouzoukis to get enough gold to buy my own ship.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go hiding place at the port
